select worker_id as id, name as name, avatar as avatar, providers_id as providerId from tbl_worker where providers_id = #{providerId} LIMIT 0,3

select region_id as id, title as communityName, img_id as imageId, providers_id as providerId from tbl_book_region where providers_id = #{providerId}
